column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The food. We ordered the Pork Belly Poutine
column3: and the Seoul Steak (as a wrap). While our server was outstanding (wish I could remember his name)
column5: I'm sorry to say was just ok.  And the reason I'm sad
column6: is because we love BCK Kitchen so much!  The flavors were just not there. And with the Seoul wrap
column8: it was just not practical for eating (it has to be rearranged to fold it up
